post.body: yes rly! I just finished submitting it. Good episode, even if you were tired. Too bad it's not a call in show!
Hey, isn't that from the musical episode of Buffy? That line is song by Spike.
Good luck, I hope she has a lot of fun!
I didn't think it was a wank off. I thought it was an interesting discussion. BTW: why did you start her on AD&D?
liked the girl-on-girl with #13? Yeah, that was pretty damn cool. The dying and stuff wasn't though. :(
those are crazy pictures! I sent some to my fiancee to demonstrate how bad it had gotten. 1M without power? http://bit.ly/LkOj
that Chris Dane Owens video "Shine" that you linked yesterday is AWESOME! I just wish the song wasn't so sucktastic.
Congratulations! I know unemployment can be hard ... I went through that a few years ago. Good luck!
Hey, you're right. The new interface is very slick and 'app' like. Thanks for the heads up!
Oh, geez! I just updated Wordpress to 2.6.5 YESTERDAY ... and there's already a new version? Sigh ...
Sorry to hear that Luke. :( Apparently they don't know how to drive on ice in St. Louis.
Thanks for the head's up on that. It's like the MegaMillions Lottery ... but with more words and less money!!! (somebody has to win.)
running a little late, huh? ;)
Thanks! I'll do that!
I used it, I followed some of it's recommendations. The real question is whether I can keep up with the increase in tweet traffic.
Do you already have an app idea for it?
I'm sorry! (Heard it was horrible.)
Cool, now try it with Heidi Klume.
Hey, I got to use my umbrella several times today! That justifies me carrying it around in my car all the time. :)
In work. Slept for 10 hrs - feeling refreshed! Now, to write a quick missive to PodgeCast.
I got my hair cut, and am now at work. It's not as cold as yesterday ... but somehow the cold is in my bones. brrr.
I'm out of here. My D&D4e group has decided to play The Window. How cool is that? Finally, a reason to use my d30's.
http://twitpic.com/r970 - @bg_meg he's not the only one. Here's the shelf I added to my cube, above my desk.
Going on a late, late lunch ... Quest to find hot chili on a cold day.
btw: my drivers side window was frozen shut this morning, I almost went without breakfast!!! :)
a work. caught up on email and tweets. what a bunch of weirdness I already see.
http://twitpic.com/qzwv - Our dog & his collection of bones, enjoying a relaxing Sunday afternoon.
well I'm up and dressed (mostly) and sitting in my comfy chair. We have the first snowfall of the season!
finally calling it a day. griped, moaned, acted pissy - and saw a movie. Now, sweet, sweet bed.
just saw Australia, then dinner. Guitar / piano player in the restaurant. That was a lot of fun.
Game night! Wrapping up a Shadowrun campaign. I brought the chips!
I'm up, clean and ready to go! No, some shopping at the bulk store and back before the gf is even out of the shower. :)
just finished watching Body of Lies. pretty dark. good, but dark.
I'm going home. I was supposed to have left 75 minutes ago ... but I had to update my FtB forums!
That comic reminded me of how many of my jokes go over. "You didn't catch the obscure reference, play on words, & anagram?"
http://xkcd.com/ - Wood Chips.
While my NH coworkers are dodging iced trees & navigating flooded streets, I'm doing just fine! Better now with TweetDeck loaded. Cool.
watching Nancy Grace (bah!) they found a body! little Kaylee?
finished meatloaf dinner. :)
well, I'm calling it a day and going home. 60 min drive, but I've got some gaming podcasts to listen to, so it won't be that bad.
Up and at work. Cold and rainy. Love the rain! Wish there was some thunder and lightening to add SFX. WOOOO!
"Bizarro! I'm helping" reached the end of PodgeCast :)
listening to PodgeCast waiting for QAGS game to begin.
OK, time to ditch the library, grab some dinner, and head over to the gaming group. QAGS Sci-Fi campaign. :)
I keep yawning. Maybe it was @trickjarret 's tweet or maybe there is something about the quiet of a library that makes me want to nap.
I retroactively blogged from back in March. Mostly transferring my paper journal to my e-version. Most entries are hidden & private.
This is so frakking cool! No card needed, free wifi at the library. Beautiful new bldg. Quiet, lots of room. Who needs an office?
I'm leaving work to hide out in the library. WiFi sanctuary that it is.
Just ordered one of each, for game night ... http://www.questcards.us/
Saturday's chinese takeout = today's lunch, FTW!
Spoke with my Mom in Michigan, she's been updated. Today's not going to end as soon as I thought it would. I'm glad I brought lunch!
I've been running late all morning and my stomach is doing flip-flops. I'll have more news in 3 or 4 hours. :(
I've had it. Time for bed and some dark work to do tomorrow. I'll tweet what when I'm allowed.
England ... nee the world, will not be the same without her! And, I'm dubious her grandson William will be able to fill her shoes.
Watching "Monarchy: Royalty at Work" DVR'ed from PBS. This is AMAZING and the queen always makes me smile.
End of a long day, watching DVR'ed Stargate: Atlantis. "The Long Goodbye" I've turned my fiancee into a geek! :)
Patriots beating the Raiders 42 to 20. Corned beef dinner & football!
There is something melancholy in Xmas music. Something sad?
saw fiancee's uncle in hospital. Then Starbucks Chai.
Had a big dinner. Had cookies & chocolates & cake. Took photo's & video of everyone. Having a pretty good, family, xmas eve.
Watching the "Man of Le Mancha" w/ Peter O'Toole & Sophia Loren. I love this old movie.
On the very, very long drive home listened to "This Modern Death" - ep01. I like the topics; a lot of ep's to get thru & see what develops
On the quick drive into work I listened to "Erotica a la Carte" - "Right of Princes" this is really well written fiction, & steamy!
Did it! Made it home for the day. Hopefully I have nothing more then rest, food, a little beer, & maybe some cheesy xmas movies scheduled.
Lunch w/ friend was delicious. Now long drive home.
almost done for the day ... almost ready to go out to lunch ...
Holy cow! within 20 minutes of getting here, I've already updated & rebooted 3 of my 4 servers. I'm almost done!!! (knock on wood ...)
I'm up and aboot. Now, to drive in to work and hope the last mS shoppers won't make the commute hell.
Merry xmas eve-eve! I'm off to bed, so I can go to work tomorrow. :( but there's a nice xmas eve dinner lined up for tomorrow, as well. :)
Just got home. 45 to 60 min drive; today, 100+ min. Xmas eve traffic CRUSHED me today. Finally, I get to eat that sub!
Traffic: horrible. HORRIBLE! Apparently every left early today. Huh.
Deposited first check as "independant consultant," & picked up Subway sub's for dinner. High flying life, huh? ;)
Checking out @MrTweet, my personal assistant for discovering the great followers and influencers in my network! http://mrtweet.net?c=11!
